bow: number of kids just curious how some of you decided how many kids to have we have boy right now who is 17mo will be having another baby shortly before his 2nd birthday sometimes think would like to be done after this baby but other times have the number stuck in my head as the perfect number of kids realize do have to decide right away getting an iud after this pregnancy so we do have any accidents while unsure enjoying my boy more and more the older he gets and am glad him and his sibling will be close in age he is getting easier to care for and get babysitter for also is able to do more on outings amp amp amp find myself longing for the baby stage of my unborn baby to be over with and for new baby to be at this age as well sorry for the rambling but basically do like being pregnant and do not like the newborn stage basically want to get it over with to get to the older stages where they are more fun to play do things with ie vacations sports activities games also for financial reasons think would probably be better able to keep car as second vehicle travel buying things for them in general saving for college anyway insight into how you decided would be great edit thank you guys so so much for the input you do even know how much of help this has been to me you ve all given me such great points and things to think through feel confident now about deciding that only want amp will be looking at permanent birth control after this baby thanks again for financial and physical reasons in my 40 the baby having in april will be our 2nd and final we are one and done family my so makes enough money that get to be stay at home mom we vacation to beach once year and my daughter gets to be in various expensive activities we buy what we want within reason and have just enough leftover for savings and her future education we have no desire for our lifestyle to change we love our toddler but did not enjoy the baby stage enjoy knowing that can give my daughter everything did not have growing up one works for us ll be 26 when my second is born and lot of my friends have started families yet worried when they start to have children will want to have another haha your reply really makes lot of sense to me and is pushing me in the direction of being done after this baby you seem like you have thought out the financial aspect very thoroughly we are in similar situation to you in regard to myself as sahm vacations ability to make fun purchases for ourselves second child should change this too much but third would possibly put us in different situation we would enjoy as much strictly financially thanks so much for the input we were blessed with two and are stopping would love to have more but we would have compromise our lifestyle and what we want to offer them which is an option in our eyes currently we spend live pretty good life we can offer both of them opportunities for different activities we get away for week of vacation and couple of one off nights through the year and buy extras for them without looking at the bank account but the biggest factor is college university when they get to that stage we would like to pay 100 for school related expenses if we have more children this is something we would be able to offer this is where grateful my husbands brothers are just starting families get to snuggle the babes but hand them back we want because we both only have one sibling and we both wish we had more siblings we do have big family and it something we want to give to our children such good points am heavily leaning toward being done after this baby it would be easy to know for sure for me so can just get my tubes tied at the same time as my section do you have the genders you wanted know once the baby is here this will be nonissue but have boy and want little girl so much amp know if had boys it would nag on me that did try again although kids the more think of it is probably not for us the reason say this is if had kids would want at least girl but otherwise do think would want boys please do judge these are my personal feelings we knew we wanted more than child and ended up with twins the 2nd time around think that made the decision on how many kids to have pretty sure all done now we have had our ultrasound yet so if find myself in your situation it will be an automatic done after second pregnancy haha big families always appealed to me as well although with kids not sure why but always love seeing families of think they are so cute we are baby people so having was hard decision for us even though we knew we did want only one child second baby was way easier than the first but we figured we were done we waited few years before making that permanent decision as we were both relatively young but after the most tiny scare my husband made his appointment so we could be officially done must say it has worked well for us all my friends with three or more kids seem way more stressed out than feel am selfish and need down time as many introverts do so this is good number for us have four three boys and girl the first two were planned boys the third boy was drunken martini surprise the fourth girl was meticulously planned because we wanted to try for daughter there is six year gap between the third and fourth if someone would have asked 20 year old me how many kids was going to have would not have said four we honestly never discussed how many we wanted but we just knew when we knew it is what was right for us we added this to our silver linings list like when we found out we were having twins we tried to think of as many positive things we could about twins since it was so terrifying and the fact that we no longer had to decide how many kids to have and the added bonus of whether or not to keep trying for boy was positive thought for us to focus on ps twins are only weeks old at this point so still leaving that option open at this point you never know we both come from families with three kids love it think three is perfect number due in august now and we plan on trying for irish twins for 27 and we really do want to have kids in our 30 we both were established really early and wanted to be young parents but unfortunately this is what we got we re both close with our siblings and while growing up and going to school with my siblings made us super close as kids love my adult relationships have with my brother and sister even more do want to deny my son those awesome connections it might be hard now and make money little tight but think the pay off is soooo worth it in the long run for my family plus at least so far we ve still been able to do our disney trip ever winter and our beach trip every summer always wanted big family came from big family mum had of us and dad went on to have another two and step son loved having lots of siblings and wanted my children to experience the same when had my son decided on just felt that could only do this to my body times if went on to have twins next would still want another so full term pregnancies that what want edit but all that could change if in ten years time you decide you re actually not done with having kids then you can choose to have more nothing had to be set in stone right now deleted yes think am in line with that way of thinking concerned about my age as still young 25 so stressing over making this permanent decision so young however an accident is not something we want after this one thanks for the input am due with second in august as well good luck with trying for the irish twins big families are special being close and having that many siblings to share memories with must be nice yes this is true do have to make this permanent decision yet am set on right now always pictured myself with boys that were your stereotypical boys rough tough full of bruises who like to snuggle it does make me sad sometimes to think this is it that wo have the baby boy but my being satisfied when we look at our friends and parents of friends when we were growing up it kind of rings true in our world kid families are divorced so we always joke that is an option it or more this second one you could say conned him into our first is in march and is going through some terrible twos right now im debating on third but from the way my first is acting dont think want to go justifying our decision to family and friends every once in while get baby fever but then remember that get to sleep through the night and my toddler is potty trained and get over it pretty fast there are so many factors that go into this decision your income level your work hours and lifestyle whether you could handle five or six kids or not etc for me the decision was shaped by my health we were not able to have more than two we tried but we lost three other babies to miscarriage and one full term in stillbirth that kinda decided it the risk became too great would ve loved three or four kids but thank god every day for the two ve already got because we nearly lost both of them as well we re aiming for between we have one year old currently my husband wants big family content with more than one but not sure could handle herd reasons why we have range instead of definite number worked with high needs kids with developmental delays for the last years there is possibility that we could have kid who needs lot more help and attention to succeed having fewer kids would be wise choice in this case birth control is 100 know other couples who ve had surprise children want to be open to that possibility too while taking precautions and planning as best we can we re trying out me being stay at home mom we are fortunate to have the option financially to go either way the more kids we have the longer ll stay home or figure out expensive childcare which increases with every child like it so far but want to keep an open mind about when going back to work makes sense spacing between kids my age 27 now hoping to space kids years apart know older pregnancies can be harder riskier open to shorter spacing too but there are hardships that come with that choice too taking pacing one at both thouht about it some more had wanted to be done having kids by 30 which had managed with the two but third woukd be in my early 30 also did want large age gap and as crazy as this sounds worried that or year age gap between the oldest and youngest might be too much we decided to go for it it just felt right our house is probably too small for it our finances not huge but sort of feel like was afforded too many luxuries growing up we were rich but never felt like was restricted growing up had my own room pool in the backyard we did travel but that was really as big need back then life was
